p: In the Central-West region, HadGEM2-ES and MIROC5 yield, respectively, average rainfall erosivity values of 9,192 MJ mm ha −1 h −1 year −1 and 9,816 MJ mm ha −1 h −1 year −1 in the baseline period. Overall, we noted a decrease in the average rainfall erosivity in the Central-West region for all models and scenarios compared to the baseline. For both scenarios, MIROC5 projected decreases in erosivity varying from −5% to −9% (increases were projected only in the south of Mato Grosso do Sul state). HadGEM2-ES projected decreases by as much as −18% with the RCP8.5 emission scenario.
